message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper deals with text segmentation and feature-representations of texts, which are common topics in computational linguistics (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of a stochastic model for language generation also suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The measurement of texts' association to the model of language generation may also be relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational complexity (cs.CC).
